Posts.Content: Aug 13, 2014 03:57AM worriedm20 wrote: Thank you for the comforting words, there's still a week to go until the test so I'll definitely try to keep busy and hope that it's nothing serious :)
Posts.Title: Lump in breast and swelling of collarbone worriedm20 bevin

Posts.Content: worriedm20 wrote: Hi all,  I am a 20 year old female and had a swelling in my breast for a few weeks and stupidly thought it would go away, after a few weeks I decided to go to the doctor and she confirmed that there was a lump in my breast and has referred me to the hospital. I am currently waiting for them to send me a time for a test but I am really nervous and hoping that anyone with experience can let me know what is going on.  I also noticed that my collarbone (near the breastbone) has been swollen on the right side (my lump is also in my right breast) for two months.  I am really worried that the two are related.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump in breast and swelling of collarbone worriedm20 bevin
